Dracon rubs his chin  and nods.

"I'm pretty confident I can get the job do=
ne for ya, and quickly.  You boys go do your thing."
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 2=
0, 2003 6:33 PM
  Subject: Re: StarDrill Inc.


  Krhinos: Do you think you=
'd be able to set the camp while Rukus and I
  place the station in orbit?
=

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
  =
> Dracon walks over to a compartment in the designated corner.  It
  seemed=
 that all  the essentials were here.  First he isolated the
  equipment fro=
m the two bombs and then began to bring it out.  He picks
  up about half o=
f it in his arms and then lugs it over, bringing the
  rest next.
  >   ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: Nic 
  >   To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  >   Sent: Thursday, June 19, 2003 9:31 PM
  >   Subject: Re: StarDrill=
 Inc.
  > 
  > 
  >   Krhinos: Alright, Rukus. The warp won't be long, so k=
eep an eye out on
  >   the other side. I want to be warned of anything unu=
sual.
  > 
  >   He took hold of a metal crate twice his size and moved it =
in the cargo
  >   hold of the large transport shuttle. The crate contained=
 nothing else
  >   than much of the necessary item to establish a base cam=
p onplanet.
  > 
  >   Krhinos: Dracon, get the mining equipment from that =
corner inside, but
  >   leave the two bombs here.
  > 
  >   --- In nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  >   > --Rukus--
  >   > 
=
  >   > "Alright Krhinos." He replies, then checks the safe distance from 
=
  >   > the station, and then turn on his comm again, "Prep for launch. 
  =
>   > Engines firing..." The engines charged up and being propulsing the 
 =
 >   > ship.
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic"=
 <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
  >   > > Krhinos: Please, no countdown. Just =
engage the drives when
  we're in
  >   > > range so we can get there and e=
stablish a camp as soon as
  possible.
  >   > > Dracon, meet me in the car=
go bay. We'll load a shuttle that we'll 
  >   > send
  >   > > down.
  >
